(im going to do a little serious reviewing because im bored)

If you wanna play some sort of tactical-ish game with some tryhards, go ahead. However, this game requires a huge amount of training to be decent and you might need to no-life a bit just for this game. Also, you might experience some performance issues once you start cranking the graphics up, but overall 60 FPS, and nice game.

TL;DR: good game, toxic community (sometimes), need lots of training to be good, small toaster can play this game on lowest graphics.
its a good game just pls spent the money to get premium

Önermem çünkü hilenin önüne geçilemiyor ve umursamıyorlar. Yeni güncellemeyle yazdıkları şeyler şaka gibi. 2 senede csgo dahada yeni kullanıcı edinmiş. Haberleri yok hileden ban yiyen nasılsa bedava oyun diye yenisini açıp geliyor. Bu oyunu oynarsanız çokça söver aşırı derece sinirlenirsiniz. Gerek yok :)

Anyone who uses a low sens does not have the dexterity to properly play FPS games on PC.

All the shitty baiters use a low sens to click people in the back of the head, or they are equally worthless and use the telescope gun and one click people in the body.

All this dude does is hold shift and prefire common angles. like wow dude, ur fucking nuts. you can have parkinsons disease and play on 1.4 sens if ur just baiting and clicking heads on common angles.

this is why forest and get right are sick players. they play on higher senitivities, and can do more than bait and off angle one click.

10/10
Very good game to play with your friends, rage a bit.
